ingredients.content: 3 ½ oz onions, cut in halves
24 - 32 oz filet mignon, cut into strips (approx. ½ in. x 2 in.)
8 oz fresh white button mushrooms, quartered
¼ tsp freshly ground black pepper

preparations.content: Place onions and garlic into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add butter and 1 tbsp of paprika, place simmering basket instead of measuring cup onto mixing bowl lid and sauté <b>5 min/212°F/speed 1<b>.
Add filet mignon, place simmering basket instead of measuring cup onto mixing bowl lid and sauté <b>4 min/250°F//speed 1<b>.
Add tomato paste, mushrooms, water, beef stock, 1 tbsp paprika, cayenne pepper, Dijon mustard, corn starch, salt and pepper, insert measuring cup and cook <b>10 min/212°F//speed 1<b>.
Add sour cream and mix <b>1 min//speed 1<b>. Serve hot.
